title: Season of Training
description: Brock Youngblood goes to a munch, his first visit in a long while, when he is approached by Cleo Braden. He knows Cleo from a motorcycle dealership, where he was a customer until Cleo’s antagonism drove his business elsewhere. She might be among the last people he wishes to encounter in his social life, much less in this aspect of his social life. But Cleo has changed. A new sense of peace and purpose seems to have come over her in the wake of being fired from the bike dealer, a new maturity that Brock finds of appeal. But neither of them can see the storm clouds brewing just beyond Cleo’s horizons …
author: Lucas X. Black
